examples: John had always been interested in technology and gadgets.
When the latest gadget was released, everyone was talking about it for a few days, but it soon became a nine-day wonder as people lost interest and moved on to the next big thing.
The new gadget was the talk of the town, but after a week, people stopped being interested.
You've got a gadget?
- We've got a gadget.
words.defineEn: a mechanical tool or an electronic device that is useful for doing something
words.defineVi: một công cụ cơ khí hoặc một thiết bị điện tử hữu ích để làm điều gì đó

examples: The app runs on all Android devices.
The app runs on all Android devices.
I left the child to her own devices for an hour.
The school discouraged the use of cell phones by implementing a ban on mobile devices during class hours to maintain a focused learning environment.
How does the device actually work?
words.defineEn: a piece of electronic portable equipment, such as a laptop, smartphone, etc.
words.defineVi: một phần của thiết bị điện tử cầm tay, chẳng hạn như máy tính xách tay, điện thoại thông minh, v.v.

examples: The pilot made every safety check before taking off, but an unexpected mechanical issue caused a delay.
By the end of the day many of the drivers were running on fumes or had experienced mechanical problems.
About 1,000 years ago, an Arab engineer added mechanical features to water clocks.
About 1,000 years ago, an Arab engineer added mechanical features to water clocks.
Piezoelectric materials turn mechanical stress, like pressure, sound waves, and other vibrations into electricity and vice versa.
words.defineEn: describing an object that is operated by machinery or engine power
words.defineVi: mô tả một đối tượng được vận hành bởi máy móc hoặc sức mạnh động cơ

examples: The local factory produces electronic components.
The flight attendant scanned my electronic ticket before I boarded the plane.
It will take an electronics expert to dismantle it.
The tech company's latest product was the frontrunner in the race to develop the next big thing in consumer electronics, with innovative features and a sleek design.
Its entire government is electronic.
words.defineEn: (of a device) having very small parts such as chips and obtaining power from electricity
words.defineVi: (của một thiết bị) có các bộ phận rất nhỏ như chip và lấy năng lượng từ điện

examples: Mum takes her hat off to her son as he comes up with an ingenious way to ensure he gets more presents this Christmas.
The Sián's engineering is ingenious.
Earwax is evolution’s rather ingenious solution to this problem.
For that, Chappelle had an ingenious idea.
So enzymes are just like whatever ingenious machinery 'they' use at the factory to make this.
words.defineEn: describing an idea, object, etc. that works very well which has resulted from clever thinking
words.defineVi: mô tả một ý tưởng, đối tượng, v.v. hoạt động rất tốt do tư duy thông minh

examples: Hopefully this makes intuitive sense.
It's a little bit more intuitive.
He clearly is intuitive.
And hopefully, it made intuitive sense.
That point has a certain intuitive appeal.
words.defineEn: describing computer software that is easy to learn and understand
words.defineVi: mô tả phần mềm máy tính dễ học và dễ hiểu

examples: FOR THE LATEST NEWS UPDATES VISIT pbs.org/newshour.
FOR THE LATEST NEWS UPDATES VISIT pbs.org/newshour.
FOR THE LATEST NEWS UPDATES VISIT pbs.org/newshour.
Sreenivasan: EUROPE IS BRACING ITSELF FOR OCTOBER 31, THE LATEST DEADLINE IN THE ONGOING BREXIT SAGA, AND OSTENSIBLY THE DAY THE UNITED KINGDOM IS SCHEDULED TO LEAVE THE EUROPEAN UNION.
Amid the pandemic are the latest of an embattled GROUP.
words.defineEn: very recent or the newest
words.defineVi: rất gần đây hoặc mới nhất

examples: Any assumptions about past elections are obsolete.
NATO, obsolete through the whole campaign.
Now, it was already obsolete by the time it first flew.
Or will indie bookstores become obsolete?
You can become very comfortable and then become obsolete very fast in the tech world.
words.defineEn: outdated and gone out of use because a new thing has replaced it
words.defineVi: lỗi thời và hết giá trị sử dụng vì một thứ mới đã thay thế nó

examples: The company abandoned its outdated marketing strategy in favor of a more innovative approach.
The old, torn sweater she wore was ugly and outdated.
Some thought the elderly woman's critiques of society were outdated and irrelevant, but an old dog barks not in vain, for experience brings valuable perspective.
The president won the election on his promise to get the economy into shape by overhauling outdated or inefficient legislation.
Mike was a tech geek and wouldn't be seen dead using an outdated smartphone model.
words.defineEn: out of date and  not in line with the latest trend
words.defineVi: lỗi thời và không phù hợp với xu hướng mới nhất

examples: The novel follows the fortunes of a village community in Scotland.
The novel is worlds apart from his academic writings.
Her latest novel takes the lid off the international art world.
She wrote a bestselling novel.
The author abstracted key themes from the novel in her literary analysis.
words.defineEn: new and unlike anything else
words.defineVi: mới và không giống bất cứ thứ gì khác

examples: These powers were eventually passed to municipalities.
It is no longer exercising power through velvet gloves.
Men still hold most positions of power in this country.
The machine is worked by wind power.
He came to power in 2019.
words.defineEn: to supply with the needed energy to make something work
words.defineVi: để cung cấp với năng lượng cần thiết để làm cho một cái gì đó hoạt động

examples: To bring charges/legal action/proceedings against somebody.
First of all, they're charging an arm and a leg.
I was put in charge of the office.
The charges against the suspect will come up in court tomorrow.
Who put Tony in charge of the accounts?
words.defineEn: to store energy in or fill an electronic device with energy
words.defineVi: để lưu trữ năng lượng trong hoặc điền vào một thiết bị điện tử với năng lượng

examples: She is currently taking a break to recharge her batteries.
I often go for a walk to recharge my batteries.
Next month, I will go on a yoga retreat to recharge my batteries.
We have been resting all weekend to recharge our batteries for the upcoming week.
Weekends allow me to take a break from work and recharge for the next week.
words.defineEn: to restore energy or refill an electronic device with energy
words.defineVi: để khôi phục năng lượng hoặc nạp đầy năng lượng cho một thiết bị điện tử

examples: Has Trump drained the swamp in Washington?
Britain has suffered a huge brain drain in recent years.
He laughed like a drain instead of giving me a hand.
She was laughing like a drain when I got there.
Ronald Reagan called for draining the swamp of bureaucrats in Washington D.C. while in 2006.
words.defineEn: to use up or waste valuable resources
words.defineVi: để sử dụng hết hoặc lãng phí tài nguyên có giá trị

examples: The boot is now on the other foot.
The fashionable boots added a trendy touch to her outfit.
He takes size 5 boots.
She wore ankle boots that emphasized her cankles.
I wore warm boots to trudge through the snowy streets.
words.defineEn: (also boot up) to start a computer, putting it into a state of readiness for operation
words.defineVi: (cũng khởi động) để khởi động máy tính, đưa nó vào trạng thái sẵn sàng hoạt động

examples: He had a slow computer that took a long time to start up.

Now start up your Minecraft launcher.
Eventually, other manned space programs started up, and now there are space travelers from lots of countries.
When puberty begins the hypothalamus starts up the ovarian cycle by secreting gonadotropin-releasing hormone about once a month.
words.defineEn: (of an electronic device or machine) to start working
words.defineVi: (của một thiết bị hoặc máy điện tử) bắt đầu hoạt động

examples: Twenty nineteens pro-democracy protests effectively shut down commerce.
The Iranian authorities shut down the internet.
This medication shuts down your estrogen and progesterone.
Today's announcement largely shut down the country through Easter and beyond.
They shut down the cafe.
words.defineEn: to stop or make something stop working
words.defineVi: để dừng lại hoặc làm cho một cái gì đó ngừng hoạt động

examples: The new software update has done the trick and fixed the issue with the app.
I need to update my passport photo.
The company has spent thousands of pounds updating their computer systems.
I need to update my address with the post office.
We recommend you save regularly by clicking on the update button.
words.defineEn: to make something more useful or modern by adding the most recent information to it, improving its faults, or making new features available for it
words.defineVi: để làm cho một cái gì đó hữu ích hoặc hiện đại hơn bằng cách thêm thông tin mới nhất vào nó, cải thiện các lỗi của nó hoặc cung cấp các tính năng mới cho nó

examples: She is currently taking a break to recharge her batteries.
I often go for a walk to recharge my batteries.

We have been resting all weekend to recharge our batteries for the upcoming week.

words.defineEn: an object that turns chemical energy to electricity to give power to a device or machine
words.defineVi: một đối tượng biến năng lượng hóa học thành điện để cung cấp năng lượng cho thiết bị hoặc máy móc

examples: Michelangelo's sculptures and paintings are a testament to the fact that genius is an infinite capacity for taking pains.
It has capacity for 100 planes.
We have the capacity.
Nearly two dozen plants are functioning under capacity.
The literal challenge is beyond today's capacity.
words.defineEn: the amount or quantity that is possible by a machine, etc. to produce
words.defineVi: số lượng hoặc số lượng mà máy móc, v.v. có thể sản xuất

examples: The dark clouds signaled that rain was on its way.
The scent of wild cherry blossoms filled the air, signaling the arrival of spring.
The clock struck eleven times, signaling the start of the event.
She holds her finger to her lips, signaling for silence.
The interneurons in the spinal cord help to relay signals from sensory neurons to motor neurons, allowing for coordinated movements.
words.defineEn: a series of electrical or radio waves carrying data to a radio, television station, or mobile phone
words.defineVi: một loạt sóng điện hoặc sóng vô tuyến mang dữ liệu đến đài phát thanh, đài truyền hình hoặc điện thoại di động

examples: The years of stagnation did a lot of harm to the younger generation.
Men of our generation never stood on ceremony.
For generations, people have made furniture out of what was available.
The torch has been passed to the new generation.
My grandmother's sloe wine recipe has been passed down through generations and is always a hit at family gatherings.
words.defineEn: a class or step of technological development
words.defineVi: một lớp hoặc bước phát triển công nghệ

examples: He knew the process backwards.

Processes to check against deterioration in the quality of the data held.
words.defineEn: the instance of a program that is being run by a system's processor
words.defineVi: phiên bản của một chương trình đang được chạy bởi bộ xử lý của hệ thống

examples: Where's my charger?

words.defineEn: a device that can refill a battery with electrical energy
words.defineVi: một thiết bị có thể nạp đầy pin bằng năng lượng điện

examples: Cable TV reaches a huge audience.

Here are cables.

words.defineEn: a wire for transmitting electricity that is protected within a rubber case
words.defineVi: một dây truyền tải điện được bảo vệ trong vỏ cao su

examples: Maybe this photograph will jog your memory.

words.defineEn: a piece of electronic object in a computer where data is stored
words.defineVi: một phần của đối tượng điện tử trong máy tính nơi dữ liệu được lưu trữ

examples: The screen is the main part of a laptop.

words.defineVi: dữ liệu trực quan được hiển thị trên màn hình máy tính hoặc điện thoại thông minh

examples: Sometimes touch screens and laptops still feel like an experiment.

Apple, on the other hand, hasn't included touch screens on any of its Macs.
words.defineEn: a display that you can interact with by physically touching it with your fingers or a special electronic pen
words.defineVi: một màn hình mà bạn có thể tương tác bằng cách chạm vào nó bằng ngón tay hoặc bút điện tử đặc biệt

examples: Narrator: 400 feet above Atlanta Hartsfield Airport, air traffic controllers oversee the skies of the world's busiest airport.

words.defineEn: a piece of equipment by which a machine is operated
words.defineVi: một phần của thiết bị mà máy được vận hành

examples: And we have a quick access to our settings control panel here.

words.defineEn: a flat screen with the controls of a machine or device on it
words.defineVi: một màn hình phẳng với các nút điều khiển của máy hoặc thiết bị trên đó

examples: Think of a magnifying glass.

words.defineVi: một vật thủy tinh có khả năng làm cho các vật nhỏ có vẻ lớn hơn

examples: The compass needle always points north.

Birds and bees have a compass like this inside them.

examples: The startup is developing cutting-edge technology, boldly going where no man has gone before in the quest for innovation.

words.defineVi: có các tính năng mới nhất và tiên tiến nhất

words.defineEn: (of a power supply or other electrical devices) not being used or switched on
words.defineVi: (của nguồn điện hoặc các thiết bị điện khác) không được sử dụng hoặc bật
